title: Bots in ranked flex
body: Hey guys whats the best way to let Rito know about the fact i have played a few games now and gotten a bot in my ranked flex team. I'm assuming they already know but just in case.

replies.body: Post game lobby reports. Also actually write the word bots in the report.

This. 

This is the best way to inform Riot you have encountered a bot, toxicity, an afk or an int feeder. 

**Please report players using the end game screen and write a little comment at the bottom of the report.**

Its interesting that this guy is trolling on every server across the world using the same bots, always named "[REMOVED]" with some number after it. He even recorded the games on his youtube channel.
Riot should use this information to test how fast their system bans (if it does) the botting before it is marked as intentional feeding.

More information [REMOVED] about this player.

Prepare to have your thread deleted, son. They just want to sweep that guy under the carpet like it didn't happen.

It's a simple delete, and I don't see why they would continue to set double standards by not doing it. I certainly will not be putting up with having my thread deleted without right of reply.

Time to uninstall, Goodbye!
